page.title: 15Uppermill 2
page.content: Uppermill, along with much of Saddleworth, is a much sought after {residential area,}so house prices are higher than surrounding areas. {Converted and renovated stone buildings are in great demand as well as newer dwellings. A large proportion of Saddleworth residents are well educated, 'middle class' people who mostly work in neighbouring areas such as Manchester, Oldham or Huddersfield.Many of these people have{moved into the area}only recently whereas other families have lived here for generations, working in traditional trades and crafts, which have now largely disappeared. There is sometimes some{ill-feeling}between these two groups of residents. In general the social problems which beset other parts of the country are less evident in this area.
